===Overview===
The '''Water People ''' is a [[human]] hunter-gatherer society based in the [[Savage Land]]. They lived close to the river with fishing as their main was of survival.

===Events===
Members of the Water People were kidnapped by the [[Swamp Men]] turned [[Savage Land Mutates (Earth-616)|Mutates]] to be part of the [[Max Eisenhardt (Earth-616)|Creator]]s experiments. They were freed by [[Kevin Plunder (Earth-616)|Ka-Zar]] and the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]].{{r|X-Men #62}}
